attributes.action: Make F1 a sporting crown jewel
attributes.additional_details: The BBC has been forced to make a new deal for future F1 TV coverage that leaves the bulk of coverage available live only on Sky pay TV.  F1 should be available live for all races on free to air TV.  By making F1 a sporting crown jewel live coverage would have to available at no cost on free to air TV in the UK. Sign this petition to show your support for the excellent BBC coverage and to express your desire for free to air F1 coverage in the UK.
